long_description: Well-suited to everyday and group rides, the Raleigh Capri 2.0 road bike combines a comfortable riding position with reliable Shimano Sora components. Women-specific geometry supplies an optimum fit and ride for women, and updated frame reduces strain on wrists, elbows, neck and lower back. Carbon fork with aluminum steerer offers lightweight, vibration-damping performance. Shimano Sora shifters and derailleurs deftly maneuver through the 18 gear combinations. FSA Vero compact crankset and 11-32 cassette let you spin with ease up tough grades and push hard on the plateaus. Vittoria Zaffiro tires feature puncture-resistant belting to deter flats. Specs on the Raleigh Capri 2.0 women's road bike are subject to change.
